text: Chad Young (July 8, 1995 – April 28, 2017) was an American professional cyclist. He was a part of the cycling team Axeon–Hagens Berman from 2015 until his death in 2017. Young was born in Newmarket, New Hampshire. Young died from injuries he got in a crash at the Tour of the Gila in Tucson, Arizona on April 28, 2017, aged 21. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile on Axeon–Hagens Berman official website Category:1995 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:American cyclists Category:Sportspeople from New Hampshire
title: Chad Young
